frontmatter.title: Black Sonata
frontmatter.description: “I hate” from hate away she threw, and saved my life, saying “not you”. - W. Shakespeare, Sonetto 145

frontmatter.title: ¡No pasarán!
frontmatter.description: La speranza era nostra compagna / a assaltar caposaldi nemici / conquistandoci l'armi in battaglia / scalzi e laceri eppure felici

frontmatter.title: Turing Machine
frontmatter.description: Codes are a puzzle. A game, just like any other game.
